text: The ASUS UX550VE-DB71T 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Touch Screen Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the battery life could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS UX550VE-DB71T 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Touch Screen Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS UX550VE-DB71T 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Touch Screen Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS UX550VE-DB71T 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Touch Screen Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!
